hackathon-description-text: Welcome to the second annual BuildHer women's hackathon, open to all marginalized genders, for both experienced programmers and those hoping to write their first lines of code.

hackathon-judges.judge-role: Professor of Computer Science, University of Chicago

In order to be eligible for this category, every member of your team must have less than a year of coding experience. If you'd like to check your eligibility, feel free to ask any member of the Exec Board.
